summary: RiskCalculatorTab.tsx shows substantial implementation aligned with funded vs own-capital flows: account mode state, account-size presets with “other”, stop-loss pips + risk amount inputs, pip-value validation (including custom pip for null lookup), in-page validation error state, and a non-blocking warning when risk exceeds account size. The diff is truncated, so some UI/AC details (conditional rendering, exact result display fields) can’t be fully confirmed from the provided evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Project metadata/state tracking file updated (project_state.json) even though the BuildRequest only specifies frontend calculator behavior changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest contains no requirement to update project state/metadata files; this is outside the requested calculator UI/logic scope.
BuildRequest does not request maintaining/updating this summary file; it is not part of the specified calculator requirements.
